Text:
Thx ! Review: V: 9  A: 9
YIFY's 750 mb rip also downloaded. His video qty is better, a clear 10, but the sound worse at 8. So it depends on what you want, better video or better sound. This sound is 6 channels YIFY's is only 2. Speech comes through good in both but soundtrack/effects are better here. YIFY's video is awesome, though, tell me how he gets the difference, pleae someone ?
